channel.title: Running client HELP
channel.description:
Okay, when I run my client it says this is the CMD box:
"Java is not recognized as an internal or external command"
Press any key to continue.
This is whats inside my Run file
@echo off java -Xmx120m -cp bin;lib/clientlibs.jar client 0 live english game0 pause

item.title: Running client HELP
item.dc:creator: @iAmChase iAmChase
item.description:
@iAmChase wrote:

Okay, when I run my client it says this is the CMD box:

“Java is not recognized as an internal or external command”

Press any key to continue.

This is whats inside my Run file

@echo off
java -Xmx120m -cp bin;lib/clientlibs.jar client 0 live english game0
pause
